Text: DON'T FORGET TO SEED AFTER YOU DOWNLOAD. :)

People are interested in downloading but no one seeds after their downloads finishes. I have been seeding this for almost 24 hours still to find only one seeder - ME. I don't want those who are already downloading this to hang up. So i am seeding this till now

Please people do seed the torrents, it ain't gonna eat up your download speed :) :) :)
Thanks people, you have started seeding, thats the way P2P network works. Download and do seed later on to ensure others enjoy the movie same as you did. :)

This was my first torrent release. I won't release any latest movies as there are a number of uploaders for that, rather i will upload only those movies which are not available anywhere in torrents :)

Thank CuteShivi for great movie

@CuteShivi IMDB par movie ka time 2 hours & 55 minutes hai, aur ye movie sirf 2 hours & 32 minutes ke hai, 23 minutes ke moive kanha gayi???
